page.title: 03Houses in Caterham Drive
page.content: I live in a road called Caterham Drive. Most of the houses are bungalows detached or semi-detached. There are no flats. There are roughly 280 houses but it is a long street. There is one family living in each house and each house has three or four bedrooms. All the houses have both back and front gardens. Caterham Drive is in a valley with very steep sides. This can be annoying to those with long slim gardens as it is difficult to mow the lawn. Quite a number of people have either cats or dogs and there is an average of four people living in each house.
